   16: 
   17: -module(metrics_session_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -define(WAIT_TIME, 500).
   24: -define(GLOBAL_WAIT_TIME, 3000).  % milliseconds
   25: -define(RT_WINDOW, 3).  % seconds
   26: 
   27: -import(metrics_helper, [assert_counter/2,
   28:                       get_counter_value/1]).
   29: 
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: %% Suite configuration
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [{group, session},
   36:      {group, session_global}].
   37: 
   38: groups() ->
   39:     [{session, [sequence], [login_one,
   40:                             login_many,
   41:                             auth_failed]},
   42:      {session_global, [sequence], [session_global,
   43:                                    session_unique]}].
   44: 
   45: suite() ->
   46:     [{require, ejabberd_node} | escalus:suite()].
   47: 
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: %% Init & teardown
   50: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: 
   52: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   53:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   54: 
   55: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   56:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   57: 
   58: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   59:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   60: 
   61: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   62:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   63: 
   64: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   65:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   66: 
   67: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   68:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   69: 
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: %% Tests
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: 
   74: 
   75: login_one(Config) ->
   76:     {value, Logins} = get_counter_value(sessionSuccessfulLogins),
   77:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
   78: 
   79:         assert_counter(1, sessionCount),
   80:         assert_counter(Logins + 1, sessionSuccessfulLogins),
   81: 
   82:         {value, Logouts} = get_counter_value(sessionLogouts),
   83:         escalus_client:stop(Alice),
   84:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
   85:         assert_counter(0, sessionCount),
   86:         assert_counter(Logouts + 1, sessionLogouts)
   87: 
   88:     end).
   89: 
   90: login_many(Config) ->
   91:     {value, Logins} = get_counter_value(sessionSuccessfulLogins),
   92:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(_Alice, _Bob) ->
   93: 
   94:         assert_counter(2, sessionCount),
   95:         assert_counter(Logins + 2, sessionSuccessfulLogins)
   96: 
   97:         end).
   98: 
   99: auth_failed(Config) ->
  100:     {value, AuthFails} = get_counter_value(sessionAuthFails),
  101: 
  102:     [{_, UserSpec} | _] = escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
  103:     UserSpecM = proplists:delete(password, UserSpec) ++ [{password, <<"mazabe">>}],
  104: 
  105:     {error, _} = escalus_client:start(Config, UserSpecM, <<"res1">>),
  106:     assert_counter(0, sessionCount),
  107:     assert_counter(AuthFails + 1, sessionAuthFails).
  108: 
  109: %% Global
  110: 
  111: session_global(Config) ->
  112:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(_Alice) ->
  113: 
  114:         timer:sleep(?GLOBAL_WAIT_TIME),
  115:         assert_counter(1, [global, totalSessionCount])
  116: 
  117:         end).
  118: 
  119: session_unique(Config) ->
  120:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}], fun(_Alice1, _Alice2) ->
  121: 
  122:         timer:sleep(?GLOBAL_WAIT_TIME),
  123:         assert_counter(1, [global, uniqueSessionCount]),
  124:         assert_counter(2, [global, totalSessionCount])
  125: 
  126:         end).
